titles.title: Access to PELL Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for job training Federal Pell Grants and to increase support for working students.
Access to PELL Act
Access to Professional Education and Lifelong Learning Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Access to Professional Education and Lifelong Learning Act or Access to PELL Act
This bill establishes a program under which the Department of Education must award job training Pell Grants to students in job training programs and increases student assistance for working students.
